resources.string: Flash your own programs to your mini!
1. Make sure the mini is turned on and is connected to a power source using a micro USB cable or a coin cell is plugged in. \n\n2. Make sure the mini firmware is flashed.

3. Location is turned off. Some Android phones require it enabled in order to scan for Bluetooth devices. \n\nIf you are sure your mini is advertising and it doesn\'t show up here, click the button below to enable Location.
The Bluetooth adapter is turned off. Click the button below to enable it.
Choose your favourite tool and start coding!
Modify the link to Open Roberta

From Android 6.0 Marshmallow onwards the application requires Location permission in order to scan for Bluetooth devices. \n\nThis is because Bluetooth may be used to determine the phone\'s and user\'s location. mini will not use this information in any way.

Hello and welcome to the Calliope mini app!
By using this app you can connect, code and flash programs to your Calliope mini via Bluetooth.

You can find inspiring and fun projects at the Calliope website at https://calliope.cc!

Have fun!
